original_text: Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep, but when they became fully awake they saw his glory and the two men who stood with him.
korean_text: 베드로와 및 함께 있는 자들이 깊이 졸다가 온전히 깨어나 예수의 영광과 및 함께 선 두 사람을 보더니

sentences.original_text: Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 베드로와 그와 함께 있던 사람들은 무거운 잠에 빠져 있었으나

sentences.original_text: but when they became fully awake
they saw his glory and the two men who stood with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 영광과 그와 함께 선 두 사람을 보았다
